title: AI Volunteer: Student care through AI automation [Art of Living AI]
team: Apoorva Acharya, Anshul Samar, Disha Patel, Vivek
tileDescription: AI-powered automation & voice support to help teachers engage, track progress, and support students—boosting efficiency & care at scale!
description: Our mission is to empower teachers with AI-driven automation and voice support, enabling them to efficiently engage with students, gain insights into their progress, and foster a supportive environment. By streamlining communication and providing a personalized experience, we aim to significantly enhance student care and overall engagement.By transforming the traditional engagement approach which is often one student at a time, teachers are empowered to reach multiple students simultaneously, achieving an order of magnitude increase in efficiency.
problemstatement: The goal of this project is to empower Art of Living teachers by streamlining student engagement. Teachers currently struggle with manual outreach, lack of progress visibility, and inefficient communication. The solution is an AI-driven platform with voice support, automating personalized communication, tracking student journeys, and offering tailored content recommendations. This increases teacher efficiency, improves student engagement, and provides data-driven insights. Key to success is a human-centered approach, incremental rollout, and a focus on practical optimization, aligning with DesignX principles to ensure the platform effectively meets teacher and student needs.
PainPoints: Manual and time-consuming outreach: Teachers have to manually contact each student through phone calls or other methods, which becomes increasingly difficult as the number of students grows. This process becomes even more strenuous as the number of students grows and as the number of events/activities happening grows with time.

Lack of visibility into student progress: Teachers do not have a system that provides insights into student progress and their journey, making it challenging to offer targeted support and guidance. For example, if the teacher would have known that their student had already done the Art of Living Part 2 Course, then the teacher can tailor the message and inspire him/her to do advanced courses like the Volunteer Training Program.

Inefficient communication: The absence of an easy-to-use interface for drafting, reviewing, and sending messages to students leads to communication inefficiencies. With no visibility into student’s Art of Living journey today on what courses they have taken, teachers often send messages that might not interest or be relevant to them.
Hard to use User interface: Today, the teacher often needs to use the computer and goes through several steps to achieve the task of sending messages.
Low student retention: Inadequate engagement and support contribute to low student retention rates.

title: Personal Branding Framework for Synergetic Diverse Outreach
tileDescription: Empowering Art of Living teachers with AI-driven marketing to build strong yoga partnerships, attract students, and scale effortlessly!
description: Agentic AI Assistant for Teacher Empowerment
problemstatement: Art of Living teachers globally often lack the skills to effectively market themselves and build relationships with established yoga businesses, hindering their ability to efficiently grow their student base. This project aims to empower teachers with an AI-powered agent designed to streamline their professional journey. The agent generates personalized branding materials (resumes, cover letters, biographies), identifies high-quality yoga studios aligned with holistic well-being, and automates outreach with persuasive emails. It also manages scheduling to prevent conflicts and ensure legal protection through studio agreements. By capitalizing on the existing interest in mind-body practices within yoga studios, the AI fosters a sustainable outreach model, expands teachers' impact, generates diverse leads, and raises mainstream awareness, all while minimizing time and effort. The goal is to enable Art of Living teachers to build synergistic partnerships with yoga businesses efficiently and effectively.
solutions: This advanced AI-powered agent is designed to support teachers in building a robust personal brand and streamlining their professional journey. Its capabilities include generating a personalized branding framework, such as an Art of Living Resume, tailored cover letters, concise biography summaries, and digital stationery like customized email signatures with integrated logos. The AI also offers actionable guidance on identifying high-quality, well-rated yoga studios nationwide,focusing on those whose mission aligns with promoting holistic mental well-being. It simplifies outreach by automatically generating professional and persuasive emails for initiating partnerships. These pitches can highlight the teacher’s ability to offer services such as weekly meditation sessions, Stress & Anxiety Protocols, or even the Art of Living courses when suitable.To maximize efficiency, the bot centrally manages the teacher’s schedule, preventing conflicts across multiple commitments, such as yoga studios, courses, and community meetups. Core Objective: Capitalize on the low-hanging fruit within yoga studios nationwide—spaces where audiences are already familiar with the value of the mind-body connection, are accustomed to paying for quality instruction, and are less constrained by rigid religious frameworks. This AI ensures teachers are legally protected through studio agreements while establishing them as credible meditation experts. The result is a sustainable and organic outreach model that generates diverse leads, raises mainstream awareness, and expands the teacher’s impact—all while minimizing the time and effort required for relationship-building and logistical coordination.
rolesAvailable: AI Scientists/Data Scientsts/ML Engineers, Back-End Engineers, Front-End Engineers

title: Swadhyaya
tileDescription: Empowering Art of Living graduates to integrate wisdom daily—boosting retention, Sadhana, Seva, and Satsang for a deeper, connected life!
description: Empowering Art of Living graduates to integrate wisdom daily—boosting retention, Sadhana, Seva, and Satsang for a deeper, connected life!
problemstatement: Art of Living graduates often struggle to integrate the teachings (Jnana) into their daily lives, resulting in low knowledge retention and inconsistent engagement with Sadhana, Seva, and Satsang. This project aims to address this challenge by developing a smartphone app that acts as a personalized guide. The app features a "Life Personal Model" (LPM), trained on Gurudev's wisdom, which analyzes daily experiences to understand the user's mental state. This AI then provides personalized insights and recommendations, fostering a broader perspective and promoting consistent spiritual practice. Users can optionally integrate wearable data for deeper analysis. With user consent, the app listens to daily conversations and tracks emotions to further refine the LPM. All user data remains on the device, ensuring privacy. The goal is to facilitate seamless integration of Jnana into daily life, enhancing retention and promoting a more consistent and fulfilling spiritual practice.
solutions: An app on a smartphone that has 1. a Life Personal Model (based on a foundation model) that collects daily experiences and updates itself on the user's mental state daily and over longer periods. The model is trained/fine-tuned on Gurudev's knowledge from a selection of Q/A as well as knowledge series. 2. A server- side LPM model distribution service that keeps tracks and provides model updates to the device. 3. Optionally, a wearable device module that collects respiration, blood pressure and cardiac metrics to deeply analyze user state throughout the day. 4. Optional server side long-term storage for archiving user- experiences and generated knowledge, along with a reporting service.The user has to grant consent to the Life Personal Model to listen to their daily conversations when the user turns it on. It may also allow the model to collect conversation s over various social media apps, like WhatsApp, iMessage, SMS and phone calls. The user can also consent to sharing physiological data from wearables to track emotions. All user data stays on the device, so there is no privacy issue.

title: Uplaud AI volunteer agent (watsapp/ message)
tileDescription: Turn course feedback into powerful word-of-mouth referrals via WhatsApp & text—seamless sharing, effortless conversion!
description: Turn course feedback into powerful word-of-mouth referrals via WhatsApp & text—seamless sharing, effortless conversion!
problemstatement: The project addresses the untapped potential of word-of-mouth referrals for Art of Living courses. While personal recommendations from trusted sources are highly effective, tracking and leveraging these referrals is currently challenging. To solve this, the project introduces Uplaud, an AI-powered platform that converts course participant feedback into shareable reviews. After completing a course, participants like Aarthi can easily share their experiences via a link that opens an Uplaud AI chatbot. This allows them to send a text or voice note, which is then transformed into a compelling review using AI. This review can then be easily shared with friends on platforms like WhatsApp. Art of Living volunteers can then view these shares and, maintaining privacy, reach out to potential leads to invite them to introductory courses. The platform also aims to automate this process with an AI Volunteer Agent, streamlining the entire referral system and maximizing course enrollment.
solutions: Aarthi graduated from the AOL Part 1 Course, and loved it. Right after the course, the volunteer requests her to share her experience of the course with her friends through a link that opens the Uplaud AI chatbot on Whatsapp or Text. Aarthi is able to send a text/voice note with her experience, which is converted to a shareable review using AI, and Aarthi can share this with her friends. As Aarthi shares this with her friends Tanmay and Prachi over whatsapp, the volunteer can see this information on the Uplaud dashboard. The volunteer can now reach out to these leads through Uplaud and invite them to an intro course. We can also automate this flow to be completely autonomous through AI Volunteer Agent.
